```{r}
query=add_triplets(subject="?oeuvre",verb="dcterms:creator", object="?auteur",
                   prefixes=c(bio="http://vocab.org/bio/0.1/",
                              dcterms="http://purl.org/dc/terms/",
                              foaf="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"),
                   limit=10) %>% 
  add_triplets(subject="?auteur",verb="bio:death",object="?mort")%>%
  add_triplets(subject="?auteur",verb="foaf:familyName",object="?nom") %>%
  send(endpoint="dataBNF")

```
